title: ARAM is no longer fun
body: Too many bots... I am playing by myself every ARAM game. It use to be a fun mode.

replies.body: I don't know if ARAM has it's own MMR or not. I say this because I NEVER have bots in my ARAM games. If I were to create a new account though then I will have bots in my games.
Yes ARAM has it's own MMR.
I have heard about this. I have never seen a bot outside of coop. Is your account new? You may be able to get past them by raising your mmr some.
I've never seen bots either. Everyone move along.
